title: Deoxyfluorination with superacids – synthesis and characterization of protonated α-fluorohydroxyacetic acid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31517-31523
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05449K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Alan Virmani, Christoph Jessen, Alexander Nitzer, Andreas J. Kornath
In this work, we present an unconventional synthesis route to generate a novel α-fluorohydroxy compound with an additional functional group.
